arts.ttl: Aberdeen red card claim on Pape Gueye sees Motherwell boss offer illuminating stance on referee call
arts.sum: Michael Wimmer felt the Senegal striker should have walked for his knee-high challenge on Andy Halliday

Getafe currently sit in 11th place in La Liga and are only four points behind seventh-placed Mallorca. Jose Bordalas's side are coming into this one off the back of two impressive results, beating bot...
All 20 LaLiga teams are in action this weekend with four matches on Saturday, five on Sunday and a Monday night game, and Phil Agius previews all 10 fixtures.
